Question: Hong Kong Etech CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
HKUST

AI Guided Limited - GUIDi™ Smart Belt

- Real-time, comprehensive navigation and route guidance for visually impaired individuals
- Uses MEMS and AI technologies
- Dual wide-angle cameras, edge AI module, haptic navigation, and voice command

Sitan Semiconductor International - 0.13-inch micro-LED Display Module

- Ultra-high pixel density (10,000 ppi)
- High brightness, long lifetime, and high efficiency
- Suitable for display units of AR/XR products
Summary_cn:
香港科技大學

AI Guided Limited - GUIDi™智能腰帶

- 為視覺上有障礙的人提供實時、全面的導航和路線指引
- 使用MEMS和AI技術
- 雙廣角攝像頭、邊緣AI模塊、觸覺導航和語音命令

思唐半導體國際 - 0.13英寸微型LED顯示模組

- 超高像素密度（10,000 ppi）
- 高亮度、長壽命和高效能
- 適用於AR/XR產品的顯示單元
